title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Competencies: Behavior Change-Based Online Healthcare Professional Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the stage-specific strategies of the Transtheoretical Model of patient behavior change and apply them to real-world cases.
Learners perform patient counseling skills with over 80% accuracy in interactive scenarios delivered via smartphones.
By the end of the course, learners can select three communication tools for promoting behavior change, adapt them to real work scenarios, and apply them.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
